structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Masonic Homes of Kentucky, Inc. -- Petition for voluntary contributions under KRS 186.164.
law.text: The Masonic Homes of Kentucky, Inc. or its successor organization may petition the Transportation Cabinet to place a voluntary contribution on Masonic Order license plates in accordance with KRS 186.164(12) to (14).
law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2009.
